targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_numbackends' AND "type_instance" = 'state-active' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_numbackends' AND "type_instance" = 'state-idle' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_numbackends' AND "type_instance" = 'state-waiting' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value"  FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_xact' AND "type_instance" = 'commit' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value"  FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_xact' AND "type_instance" = 'rollback' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative("value", 10s) AS "value"  FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "type_instance" = 'pg_checkpoints'
SELECT derivative("value", 10s) AS "value"  FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "type_instance" = 'pg_slow_queries'
SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value"  FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "type" = 'pg_n_tup_c' AND "type_instance" = 'del' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"))  AS "value"  FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "type" = 'pg_n_tup_c' AND "type_instance" = 'upd' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"))  AS "value"  FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "type" = 'pg_n_tup_c' AND "type_instance" = 'ins' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'heap_hit' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'heap_read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'idx_hit' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'idx_read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'tidx_hit' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'tidx_read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'toast_hit' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("value")) AS "value" FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'pg_blks' AND "type_instance" = 'toast_read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Shared Buffer 命中率(不低于99%)
整体索引缓存命中率(不低于99%)

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("value")) FROM "postgresql_value" WHERE "host" = '192.168.1.124' AND "instance" = 'postgres' AND "type" = 'derive' AND "type_instance" = 'tps-postgres' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
